title: The Zero Blessing
description: Caitlyn Aguirre should have been a magician. Her family certainly expected her to be a magician. But by the time she reached her twelfth birthday, Caitlyn hadn't even managed to cast a single spell! In desperation, her parents send her - and her magical sisters - to Judeâ€™s Sorcerous Academy, her last best chance to discover her powers.  But as she struggles to survive her classes without a single spell to her name, Caitlyn starts to uncover an ancient mystery that may prove the key to her true powers... ...If she lives long enough to find it.
author: Christopher G. Nuttall
